contentrichtext.text: {{BLP IMDB refimprove|only=yes|date=March 2011}} '''Ringo Lam Ling-Tung''' ({{zh|t=林嶺東|s=林岭东|p=Lín Lǐngdōng}}, [[Standard Cantonese|Cantonese]]: Lam Ling-tung), born in 1955 is a [[Hong Kong]] [[film director]], [[Film producer|producer]] and [[Screenwriter|scriptwriter]]. He is known for gritty, dark and realistic action thrillers. noted for films such as ''[[City on Fire (1987 film)|City on Fire]]'', ''[[Prison on Fire]]'', ''[[Full Contact]]'' and ''[[Full Alert (film)|Full Alert]]''. He was born in [[Hong Kong]] and studied film at [[York University]] film school in [[Toronto]]. [[Quentin Tarantino]]'s ''[[Reservoir Dogs]]'' (1992) was reworked from Lam's ''[[City on Fire (1987 film)|City on Fire]]'' (1987), and critics have indicated that there are shot-by-shot copies of certain action sequences. Most of his films include a collaboration with [[Chow Yun-fat]]: ''City on Fire'' (1987), ''Prison on Fire'' (1987), ''[[Wild Search]]'' (1989), ''[[Prison on Fire II]]'' (1991) and ''Full Contact'' (1993). also with [[Jean-Claude Van Damme]]: ''[[Maximum Risk]]'' (1996), ''[[Replicant (film)|Replicant]]'' (2001), and ''[[In Hell]]'' (2003). ==Filmography as director== * ''[[Esprit d'amour]]'' (1983) * ''[[The Other Side of Gentleman]]'' (1984) * ''[[Cupid One]]'' (1985) * ''[[Aces Go Places 4]]'' (1986) * ''[[City on Fire (1987 film)|City on Fire]]'' (1987) * ''[[Prison on Fire]]'' (1987) * ''[[School on Fire]]'' (1988) * ''[[Wild Search]]'' (1989) * ''[[Undeclared War (film)|Undeclared War]]'' (1990) * ''[[Touch and Go (1991 film)|Touch and Go]]'' (1991) * ''[[Prison on Fire II]]'' (1991) * ''[[Twin Dragons]]'' (1992) * ''[[Full Contact]]'' (1993) * ''[[Burning Paradise]]'' (1994) * ''[[The Adventurers (1995 film)|The Adventurers]]'' (1995) * ''[[Maximum Risk]]'' (1996) * ''[[Full Alert (film)|Full Alert]]'' (1997) * ''[[The Suspect (1998 film)|The Suspect]]'' (1998) * ''[[The Victim (1999 film)|The Victim]]'' (1999) * ''[[Replicant (film)|Replicant]]'' (2001) * ''[[Looking for Mr. Perfect]]'' (2003) * ''[[In Hell]]'' (2003) * ''[[Triangle (2007 film)|Triangle]]'' (2007) ==See also== * [[Cinema of Hong Kong]] ==External links== *{{IMDb name|id=0482681}} {{Ringo Lam}} {{Best Director HKFA}} {{Authority control|VIAF=5135409}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Lam, Ringo | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1955 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lam, Ringo}} [[Category:1955 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Hong Kong film directors]] [[Category:York University alumni]] [[Category:Hong Kong film producers]] {{HongKong-film-director-stub}}
